  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      @GetMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<VeterinarianAppointmentOutputDto>> getAllAppointments()
      GET method to get a list of all appointments from the database
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and a list with all appointments

    • getAllAppointmentsForDogId

      @GetMapping("/dogid/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Iterable<VeterinarianAppointmentOutputDto>> getAllAppointmentsForDogId(@PathVariable("id") Long dogId)
      GET method to get a verterinarian appointment by dog id
      Parameters:
      dogId - ID of the dog for which information is requested
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and a list with the requested appointment(s)

    • createAppointment

      @PostMapping("") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> createAppointment(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid VeterinarianAppointmentInputDto veterinarianAppointmentInputDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      POST method to create a new veterinarian appointment
      Parameters:
      veterinarianAppointmentInputDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      bindingResult - a Spring object that holds the result of the validation and binding and contains errors that may have occurred
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with created http status code and URI pointing to the newly created entity, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • updateVeterinarianAppointment

      @PutMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> updateVeterinarianAppointment(@PathVariable("id") Long appointmentId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid VeterinarianAppointmentInputDto veterinarianAppointmentInputDto, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult)
      PUT method to update (if appointment exists) or create (if appointment does not exist) a veterinarian appointment
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - ID of the appointment for which information is requested
      veterinarianAppointmentInputDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      bindingResult - a Spring object that holds the result of the validation and binding and contains errors that may have occurred
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with ok http status code and updated or created appointment, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • patchVeterinarianAppointment

      @PatchMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> patchVeterinarianAppointment(@PathVariable("id") Long appointmentId, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid VeterinarianAppointmentPatchDto veterinarianAppointmentPatchDto)
      PATCH method that updates an appointment only when the appointment exists in the database
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - ID of the appointment for which information is requested
      veterinarianAppointmentPatchDto - Data Transfer Objects that carries data between processes in order to reduce the number of methods calls
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with OK http status code and the updated appointment, or bindingResultError if there is an error in the binding

    • deleteAppointment

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Object> deleteAppointment(@PathVariable("id") Long appointmentId)
      DELETE method to delete an appointment from the database by id
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - ID of the appointment for which information is requested
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity with no content http status code
